text: Aspergillus elegans is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Circumdati section. The species was first described in 1978.Gasperini, G. 1887. Sopra un nuovo morbo, che attacca i limoni e sopra alcuni ifomiceti. Atti della Societa Toscana di Scienze Naturali. 8(2):328-332 ==Growth and morphology== A. elegans has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below. Aspergillus_elegans_cya.png|Aspergillus elegans growing on CYA plate Aspergillus_elegans_meaox.png|Aspergillus elegans growing on MEAOX plate == References == elegans Category:Fungi described in 1887
title: Aspergillus elegans
